name: UFO Skipper
description:
A little alien with a spaceship visits the planet earth. However, the oval shaped ship is damaged. A boy finds it and enjoys stone skipping with his newly found object. Created using Unity3d in Global Game Jam 2017: http://GGJ.org/2017/games/ufo-skipper

How to Play

Try to hit the wave peaks with correct angle. Beware the bird.

  • Up/Down (or W/S) to chane ufo rotation.
  • Space to boost the rocket motor.
